HUE_CONNECTION_CONFIG_DESC: Enter the ip address or hostname of the Hue bridge, press the link button on the bridge and press >Connect< within 30 seconds.
HUE_UNPAIR_CONFIG_DESC: Press >Disconnect< button to disconnect Volumio from Hue bridge
HUE_BRIDGE_ADDRESS_DOC: The the ip address or hostname of the Hue bridge
HUE_SETTINGS_DESC: The settings for the Hue Control plugin
HUE_SWITCH_OFF_DELAY_DOC: The number of seconds to wait before switching off the Hue device(s) after the playback has stopped.
HUE_DEVICE_DOC: Hue bulb or smart power outlet to contol
